name: Quick and Delicioso Cuban Style Black Beans
source_file: Quick and Delicioso Cuban Style Black Beans.txt
description: Cuban inspired black beans loaded with flavor! Easy to make and ready in twenty minutes. Low fat, super high in fiber, vegan, gluten free, inexpensive and delicioso!
ingredients: 15 oz can black beans (do not drain)
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Chop onion, garlic, scallions, red pepper, and cilantro in a mini chopper or food processor.
Add oil to a medium-sized pot on medium heat.
Add vegetables to the pot and saute until soft, about 3 minutes.
Add beans, water, bay leaf, cumin, oregano, red wine vinegar, salt and black pepper and bring to a boil.
Lower heat and cover, simmer about 15 minutes stirring occasionally (adjust water as needed).
